awasanaye ema kanthawan hatada sidu wune saban kallak ho kek gediyak wannatayi.namuth ayage mema kriya pilibadawa polisiya asa gasa sita atha.polisiya witeka ayata chodana kalada aya ema siyalu chodana prathikshepa kara atha.inpasuwa polisiya ayage aadaraniyama puthraya wana disepita chodana karannata wiya.eya daragatha nohaki thana aya thaman sidukala siyalu aparadha helikarannata wiya.ayage papochcharanayenpa pasuwa aya wasara thihak barapathala wada sahithawa sira daduwam widi athara wasara thunak pissan kotuwaka gatha kirimatada siduwi thibina.awasanaye 76 wiyedi aya rakthaghathayen maranayata path wi atha.
